title: Plum and blackberry pavlova
ingredients: ['For the meringue', '4 egg whites', '250g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '1 teaspoon white wine vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'For the filling', '300ml double cream, whipped', '1 handful blackberries', '4 plums, stoned and cut into wedges']
